goals.active: Meet Eir at her Hoelbrak homestead.
goals.complete: I sparred with Eir, both physically and verbally, and she taught me a very important lesson about taking what I've learned so far and using it to prepare for my showdown with Mikkel Toivosson. I'm ready now, in both body and mind. On to the championship!

goals.active: Participate in the Big Brawl final match near Lake Mourn.
goals.complete: I defeated Mikkel Toivosson to become the new Big Brawl champion. It felt great to avenge my earlier defeat and repair my reputation, but it's even better knowing that both Knut Whitebear and Eir think I'm the kind of champion who will inspire the people of Hoelbrak.
